name: Avoid AE Schema with Target namespace not defined (TIBCO BW)
description: This rule searches for AE Schema without the targetNamespace attribute defined.
output:
This report lists all  AE Schemas having  no Target Namespace defined.
It provides the following information:
AE Schema full name.
rationale: Namespace favor modular programmation, and allow for multi-sourcing, importing code from different groups or organization without encountering clashes and overlapping.
reference:
GEN-003: Target namespace not defined
Framework Design Guidelines: Conventions, Idioms, and Patterns for Reusable .NET Libraries, 2nd Edition
https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/vstudio/ms229026(v=vs.110).aspx
remediation: Define a target namespace. A good targetNameSpace should be customized with a mnemonic name such as http://company.com/category/feature.xsd.
